job.title: Data Scientist

development reporting insights project management presentation of results and recommendations to stakeholders Shehe will work closely with multiple engineering teams to support the research and development of Data Science technologies  Our team is fearless in pursuit of new ideas and uncompromising in our quest to become a world class team solving complex problems and improving patient outcomesGE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator Our Digital organization is structured around three major areas Products amp Platform Go to Market and
